description.value:
Requires free hand to use. As a Free Action, Character grips the eye's container and makes Willpower Test. For every degree of Success gain +10 to next Evasion or Opposed Stealth Test until the start of next turn.

Requirements

The Fossilised eye of a Tzeentchian Daemon. Heretical. Only functions for those dedicated to Tzeentch.

Effect: Extremely Rare

Notes: -
